Dilophosaurus, a dinosaur made famous by Jurassic Park that lived 183 million years ago, was 'bigger and more powerful' than the movie made it appear, study shows.

articles.title: Earth's magnetic field could be moving MUCH faster than thought - implications for life - Express.co.uk

articles.title: Seagrass Loss Is Causing Massive CO2 Rises - Technology Networks
articles.description: Modeling by marine scientists has shown that the loss of seagrass meadows on the Australian coastline has contributed to a substantial increase in carbon dioxide emissions.
